name: WuXu's Library++
subtitle: The Most Up-To-Date IPA Library on AltStore.
description:
Welcome to WuXu’s Library++!

This source contains all your favourite tweaked apps, free streaming, cracked apps, and more!

This highly organised AltSource is made up of many different tweaked apps that I, myself, inject each and every deb/dylib (tweak) into. While making sure everything is working perfectly and to my standards.

This source is updated 2-3 times a week, or more depending on the urgency. But I am working on automating updates through a python bot which I am close to completing.

If you enjoy my source please spread the word, this is essentially an updated QuarkSources, and I would like it to be as big, if not, bigger!

To make requests, get support or chat with other users, join the discord server! https://discord.gg/nKXsSdbEDc

WuXu’s Sources Official Website: https://wuxu1.github.io/

apps.name: YouXube
apps.subtitle: The most popular YouTube tweaks combined into one!
apps.localizedDescription:
This is an older version of YouTube, with every youtube tweak combined into one - making it the best youtube tweak possible! If you are willing to use an outdated version of YouTube, with more functionality and tweaks/features, then definitley download this!

App Includes:

• uYouplus
• YTMurderer
• YTKillerPlus (Cracked)
• iSponsorBlock
• And many many more…

privacy.name: AppleMusic
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you add your own audio files to your videos.

privacy.name: BluetoothPeripheral
privacy.usageDescription: YouTube needs bluetooth access to scan for nearby Cast devices.

privacy.name: Camera
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you create videos using the app.

privacy.name: Contacts
privacy.usageDescription: Your contacts will be sent to YouTube servers to help you find friends to share videos with.

privacy.name: LocalNetwork
privacy.usageDescription: Access to your network allows YouTube to discover and connect to devices such as your TV.

privacy.name: LocationWhenInUse
privacy.usageDescription: Makes it easier for you to attach location information to your videos and live streams and allows for features such as improved recommendations and ads.

privacy.name: Microphone
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you include audio with your videos and search using your voice.

privacy.name: PhotoLibrary
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you upload media you've already created.

news.title: YouXube Added!
news.caption: YouXube, every YouTube tweak combined into one, has been added to the source! Click here for more info
